verses.name: Genesis 3:18
verses.text: Thorns also and thistles shall it bring forth to thee; and thou shalt eat the herb of the field;

verses.name: Genesis 3:19
verses.text: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.

verses.name: Genesis 3:20
verses.text: And Adam called his wife’s name Eve; because she was the mother of all living.

verses.name: Genesis 3:21
verses.text: Unto Adam also and to his wife did the Lord God make coats of skins, and clothed them.
